Music

The other passion of mine, which is part of my daily lifestyle, is music. I enjoy being creative and compose and produce music. I have made various pieces, some from scratch and others have been through sampling.

Artist

I’ve done many projects as a stand-alone artist. Currently I’m working on two projects, one has a melancholy, lonely but wholesome atmosphere whilst the other is part of a rap collective.

Producer/Composer/ Engineer

I’ve created a collection of pieces where they all have their own themes. I’ve created a game score before taking inspirations from games such as Splunky and Dead Cells. The Project was called Dig Gold, here are a few samples:
